teacher_info.intro:
My name is Evgenia, I'm new to Italki but not new to teaching Russian. I've taught students from all the continents excluding Antarctica (if you're from there please be my student). I work with students of all levels, from A1 (ТЭУ) to C2 (ТРКИ-IV). I’ve got experience teaching complete beginners. I also work with kids from 7 y.o. and older.
A little bit about me: I’m 31 years old. I've lived and worked in Spain and Georgia. Currently I’m back home to Siberia, Russia. I have 2 uni degrees: teaching Russian as a foreign language and law. I live with my family: my husband Ryan, dogs Major and Keeley, and cat Tom. In my free time I read books on how to trick my students' minds and cuddle my zoo.

teacher_info.introduction:

Russian is my native language, but I can also speak English as well as French.
I'm a graduate of the Teachers’ Training University in Yaroslavl (Russia) with a major in translation and interpretation (French & English). 

Check out my Instagram where I explain interesting and tricky things in Russian, share useful grammar tables and other things: https://www.instagram.com/russianskype/

●   I offer General course of Russian language. 
- I teach all levels of Russian, even if you are an extreme beginner. 
- I provide all the necessary material, so you don’t need to buy anything. 
- Increasing vocabulary every lesson. 
- Watching Russian movies, cartoons. 
- Reading texts, books, articles in Russian, discussion. 
- Conversation in Russian about different topics. 
- Learning not just Russian language, but also Russian culture, traditions and realities. 


If you have any questions about lessons, don’t hesitate to ask me! I usually reply within a few hours.

teacher_info.about_teacher: Я использую коммуникативный подход. Предпочитаю говорить на уроке только на изучаемом языке и объяснять все на этом же языке. Стараюсь строить урок так, чтобы ученик говорил большее количество времени(80%/20%). I use communicative approach. I prefer speaking the language we are learning most of the lesson time. I try to plan a lesson such a way, that my students speak most of the time(80%/20%).
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мне нравится слушать различные песни и разбирать их тексты. Я люблю смотреть и показывать фрагменты из фильмов и передач. Со взрослыми я люблю обсуждать спорные вопросы на тему культуры, искусства, психологии и тд. 
I like listening to songs and work on the lyrics. I like showing  the extract from the films or TV-shows. I like discussing interesting, exciting , sometimes controversial tissues with adults on such topics as cultures, Art, Psychology etc.

teacher_info.introduction: Many people believe that informal everyday conversation is random and conversational unstructured. This is, in fact, far from true. Although conversation skills may take many forms and the speakers and situations vary widely, all conversation follows certain patterns. ‘involves planning a conversation programme around the specific microskills, strategies, and processes that are involved in fluent conversation. In my approach I engage learners in conversational interaction. I find the most effective ways of preparing you for spontaneous communication. We will do situational role plays, problem-solving tasks, and information-gap exercises, I also involve planning a conversation aroung the spicific microskills, strategies and processes that are involved in fluent conversation. My style of teaching is relaxed and informal and my approach is natural and very conversational. I will help you to improve your vocabulary and confidence. I have experience teaching students from all over the world with many different cultural backgrounds and learning styles. I tailor the sessions to your own learning preferences and skill sets. I am a full-time teacher, meaning that my schedule is open throughout the day and students can choose the class times that best suit them. I put all of my energy and enthusiasm into teaching my students. You can tell me your special needs, and I will do my best to help. My lessons aim to get you using the language for fluency. We will discuss your own personal aims, and I will assess your level of competency to see what lessons will work best for you, personally. I tailor the sessions to your own learning preferences and skill sets. Our conversations are based around YOUR interests, as well as some subjects I feel are essential to your progression as a Russian speaker. We can speak of music, movies, travel, activities, books, food, daily life, etc. I look forward to meeting you! :)

pro_course_detail.title: For my old students - Italian
pro_course_detail.description:
Start to speak, listen, read and write in Italian

During this course, you will learn some of the vocabulary and phrases you need to help you interact with people at a basic level.

You will start to develop the four language skills of speaking, listening, reading and writing through a range of activities, which will introduce the language in authentic settings, and audio resources, which will let you hear the language in action.

There are some activities where you will also practice your speaking skills, as it is important that you start speaking as soon as possible.

You will also learn some essential Italian grammar, including some basic verbs, such as essere (to be) and chiamarsi (to call). Finally, you will get some tips and advice on how to develop your study skills, so that you can become a successful language learner.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I'm a teacher at heart. Whatever i do, i teach. I love getting to the core of things and communicating that to others. Therefore my approach is that of believing in you, respecting your efforts and helping you stay motivated to get better and better with your skills every day. I would describe my approach as student-led. You decide where you want to be and I show you ways to get there efficiently.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are built on the principle revise-introduce-ensure. I believe in structure as it creates stepping stones for you to grow on what you've learnt in the previous lesson. Every language learning must be practical, as language is made to communicate and not to sit in a dusty Grammar book. Therefore every lesson begins with a warm up, which will be relevant to your level, but will surely tune you into the lesson ahead. Then, we revise what we have studied previously, after which new material can come. And then we ensure until you are as easy with the material as a surfer riding a wave!

exp_info.description: Parallel interpreting in classroom setting, English-Russian

Private tutoring in English, French and Italian, teaching various age groups (from 7 and up), both children and adults, focusing on various aspects of the language. My experience includes teaching business Italian, basic French, preparation for exams in English etc.

Interrupted by 2 years of doing mission work in Africa, in 2013 I resumed private tutoring on a new place. In Potchefstroom my focus was more on teaching English to school-age children, including special needs
After maternity leave, I came back to private tutoring, this time focusing on adults and adding Afrikaans to my teaching languages

pro_course_detail.description: Напишите мне в личку. Want to learn Russian, but don't know where to start? Or worse, you just tapped into it and all those cases just appear too daunting? pro_course_detail.title: English from scratch /Английский с нуля
pro_course_detail.description: *Дорогие студенты из России, у вас ЕСТЬ пути заниматься на italki, несмотря на сложности с оплатой. Напишите мне в личку.* Данный тип урока предназначен для русскоговорящих взрослых учеников (старше 15 лет), начинающих обучение с нуля. Мы все когда-то начинали, возможно даже имели 5 в школе - и где оно  всё? Вот для таких начинавших и подготовлен этот курс. Вспомним основы, разберём то, что в школе недопоняли, научимся использовать язык в речи. У Вас всё получится!

pro_course_detail.title: English Tenses/Английские времена
pro_course_detail.description:
Трудности с английскими временами? Неудивительно! Как после трёх простых времён в родном языке научиться использовать 12?! За свою практику я поняла, что для освоения английских времён важен один ключевой фактор - понять их логику! Как думает говорящий, используя то или иное время? Мой курс, основанный на авторском подборе материала с обязательным выходом в речь поможет и Вам наконец ПОНЯТЬ времена в английском.

Struggling with English tenses? Who doesn't! Over the years of teaching English I came to realise that the key factor here is simply to grasp the LOGIC behind tenses. How does the speaker THINK when choosing one tense or another? My authentic course based on a variety of grammatical/audio/video material will help you wrap your mind around tenses in English.

pro_course_detail.title: Business English / Interview Prep
pro_course_detail.description:
Dreaming of a job in an international company? Sounds great, but to get that one has to prove your command of English and ability to use it in a workplace. In this course we will zoom in on business etiquette of English-speaking countries, look into the situations at work where you need English, learn some great phrases and workplace idioms.
If you only wish to prepare for an interview - not a problem. Here is how I can help:
- Mock Interviews (Roleplay: I am the recruiter - you are the applicant)
- Useful phrases/ Vocabulary
- Most common questions and ideas for answering them
- Tricky questions and how to turn them to your benefit

I'm here to help you feel more confident in your real-life interview and help you shine!

teacher_info.intro:
Hi everyone! My name is Faina. I was born in Russia, so Russian is my native language. I also speak English, a bit of Italian, French, and Esperanto. Furthermore, I had an experience as a simultaneous interpreter, and once had a language exchange in France in the Esperanto community. 

Alongside being a teacher, I work as a musician. I play the drums, the violin, and the piano, and I'm always happy to discuss music with like-minded people. I'm interested in plenty of things, from art and music to science and society.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
✏️ I graduated from the Moscow State University Russian Language Center and got a qualification as a professional teacher. I teach as a qualified teacher since 2019, but I started my tutor practice earlier while still a student.

 I'm interested in learning areas related to the language, such as psycholinguistics, linguistic studies, etc. It helps me better understand language learning and teaching processes.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
✏️ My teaching style takes a student-centred approach. I believe that the more personalised language you use is, the more likely you're to remember it. That's why I craft each lesson according to your needs and take into account your interests. For all classes, for all students, I always create a personalised PDF presentation with all the learning materials.
I try to avoid outdated materials and teach the authentic language.
My students are always my friends, I think a friendly atmosphere is truly important thing in a class. That allows you to feel comfortable, relaxed and confident.

course_info.trial_description:
The trial lesson is a good opportunity to get to know each other. We'll discuss your goals and learning style. I can gauge your current language level in case you've learned the language before so that I can choose the most suitable materials for our future lessons. If there's a specific area you want to improve, we can also quickly work on it in the instant trial.
If you're a beginner, this lesson will be a short introduction to the Russian language, where you will learn some basic Russian phrases and collocations, rules of reading and pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners from zero to hero
pro_course_detail.description:
this is a special course for beginners, it's ideal if you're an absolute beginner. after it, you will no longer think that Russian is difficult because everything will be in its place in your head.
 you'll learn Russian from the basics to the confident a2 level. the course has a strong topic order which makes your studying consistent. we start from learning the alphabet, setting the pronunciation, learning how to read, and then move on to the basic topics. I write all the explanations and use different visual aids to make your studying both interesting and effective.
after every lesson, you receive the pdf from the lesson with my comments and explanations.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversations or "Coffee house talk"
pro_course_detail.description:
☕️ in this course, I suggest some kind of «‎coffee house talk»
   • you talk most of the time
   • you can speak about anything you want, set the topic (or not, then I'll prepare some materials for discussion)
   • we can watch videos, read articles with further discussion
I support the dialogue. at the end of the lesson, I correct mistakes (pronunciation, grammar, lexis, etc). this variant is the best if your goal is a fluent spoken language. for this course, you should have some grammar and lexical knowledge.

pro_course_detail.title: Rock your grammar!
pro_course_detail.description: If you need to improve your grammar and learn everything about the most complex topics such as the verbs of motion verb's aspects, cases, etc, this course is for you! It will boost your Russian until the Pushkin level. It's also suitable for test preparation.

pro_course_detail.title: Sunday classes
pro_course_detail.description: Sunday evening classes are available to all my students. The focus will be decided by your specific needs.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
this course is for you if you have already learned something and would like to continue. we will work on all the language aspects and gradually raise your level. reading, speaking and listening are included. 
for all of my lessons, I create pdf presentations with visual materials (images, texts, exercises, videos, etc) which you can use after the class for revising and doing homework.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Я помогу вам улучшить навыки разговорного русского, поработать над произношением и пониманием русской речи на слух. С удовольствием отвечу на все ваши вопросы, связанные с языком и культурой.
I will help you improve your speaking Russian, work on pronunciation and listening. I will be happy to answer to all your questions about language and culture.

Если вы новичок, то уроки "Learn Russian words" с легкостью и интересом помогут пополнить словарный запас, а после занятий всегда сможете учить их еще и самостоятельно.

If you are a beginner, the lessons of "Learn Russian words" will help you to expand your vocabulary easily and with fun, after classes you can always learn language on your own.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Самое главное - много говорить. Обсуждать можно любые темы (историю, культуру, медицину, науку, фильмы, видео Ted, как ваше настроение, как у вас прошел день и т.д.). Не бойтесь совершать ошибок, для этого и нужны подобные занятия.

The most important thing in classes is to talk a lot. We can discuss any topics (history, culture, medicine, science, movies, Ted videos, how was your day, etc.). Don't be afraid to make mistakes.

Я также обычно готовлю материалы к занятию (тексты, диалоги, кроссворды, видео, песни, флэш-карточки), чтобы было интереснее. 

I also usually prepare materials for the lesson (texts, dialogues, crosswords, videos, songs, flash cards) to make it more interesting.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I've been teaching for over 1 year on different online platforms. I have 2 Bachelors's degrees in Advertising and PR, where I studied the language on a professional level and Fine Art. My aim is to provide a perfect learning practice for you, through the following:

1. Customized programs to perfectly fit your needs
2. Classes with different tasks on listening, reading, writing, and speaking
3. Games and work with associations to remember new words
3. Homework (if welcome)
4. Tracking progress

I teach Russian to people of different levels and any age from 8 years. I speak freely in English and French, so learning will be comfortable for you
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons are different for different people. It depends on your way of learning languages but I always suggest not to make language learning a 'fast food'. I make an accent on speaking and listening practice and I always strive for at least 80% student talking time and 20% teacher talking time. However, I suggest making homework on grammar and writing so that you'll feel comfortable with Russian. 


Overall, my style is warm. I'm a teacher who encourages and guides students to achieve their goals. Of course, I don't forget to be funny sometimes

teacher_info.about_me:
Всем привет! Меня зовут Татьяна. Я не говорю по-английски (I don't speak English!), но немного говорю по-итальянски (parlo italiano). Я русская, живу в Москве. Учусь на педагога. Люблю читать, смотреть фильмы, вязать крючком,... могу говорить на абсолютно разные темы.

По профессии я режиссёр монтажа, работаю в кино и на ТВ. А также я "вечный студент": люблю учиться всему! Буду рада познакомиться с вашей культурой и рассказать о своей.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Мне нравится делиться своими знаниями. Я очень терпеливая и достаточно эмоциональная. Я сама изучаю разные языки и знаю трудности, с которыми мы сталкиваемся, пытаясь начать говорить на иностранном языке. 
В своих уроках я стараюсь помимо лексики и грамматики также обращать внимание и на произношение, и на интонацию. Вместе мы научимся не только говорить на русском языке, но и выражать свои эмоции и понимать эмоции русских людей.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
У меня есть разные уроки:
1. Мы можем просто разговаривать на любые интересные тебе темы.
2. Можем изучать грамматику: я объясняю правила и даю упражнения
3. Можем работать с лексикой — есть разные игры.
4. Можем разбирать книги или фильмы.
Или можно всё это чередовать или объединять в одном уроке.

course_info.trial_description:
Пробный урок — знакомство. 
Говорим на любую тему, какую хочешь. 

На этом уроке мы сначала познакомимся и обсудим твои планы и пожелания по изучению русского языка. А потом поговорим на любую тему — ведь наша цель именно научиться говорить на русском.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
Разговорная практика для уровней B1 — C2. 

- Как говорят простые русские люди и как говорить правильно?
- Разговорные фразы и междометия.
- Пословицы и поговорки.
- Учимся выражать эмоции по-русски.
...и многое многое другое...

Я готова поговорить с вами практически на любую тему, в общих чертах. Но, если вы хотите глубоко окунуться в какую-то конкретную тему — напишите мне заранее, я подготовлю различные материалы на интересующие вас темы.

pro_course_detail.title: Фонетика русского языка
pro_course_detail.description:
Специальные уроки по фонетике, произношению, артикуляции, интонации...
Что мы будем делать на этих уроках?
— практикуем произношение отдельных букв, слов, фраз.
— читаем тексты и учимся правильно передавать все звуки.
— учимся "читать" знаки препинания (то есть, правильно воспроизводить эмоции текста)
— работаем с интонацией.
— слушаем / смотрим русские диалоги и пытаемся понять эмоции и интонацию.

по желанию:
— артикуляционные упражнения
— дыхательная гимнастика

pro_course_detail.title: Il russo per italiani (da zero)
pro_course_detail.description: Ciao! Mi chiamo Tatiana ed io parlo un po' italiano. Posso spiegarti la grammatica russa in italiano e poi io e te possiamo parlare in russo.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone, I am Mary, an English teacher living in Russia. Needless to say, I can teach Russian as well.
I’ve been teaching English for 10 years. I obtained my Bachelor’s Degree in philology in 2015 since then I’d worked in public and private schools, took the CELTA course in Barcelona and set up my own language centre. So I am quite experienced teacher. I teach English and Russian for any levels and ages. 

I am crazy about teaching and learning languages so most of my time is devoted to them. I am also into playing tennis, running, reading, coding, testing and cooking. I do care about my body so I go to the gym three times a week.

teacher_info.about_teacher: Привет всем! Меня зовут Мария, я - преподаватель английского языка, живущий в России. Разумеется, я могу преподавать также и русский. Я преподаю английский уже 10 лет. У меня диплом бакалавра по специальности - филология 2015 года, с того времени я работала как в государственных,  так и в частных школах, получила CELTA в Барселоне, открыла свой языковой центр. Я довольно опытный преподаватель.  Я преподаю английский и русский любым уровням и возрастам. Я с ума схоже по преподаванию и изучению языков, поэтому большая часть моего времени посвящена им. Мне также нравится играть в теннис, бег, читать, кодить, тестить и готовить. Я забочусь о своем теле, поэтому хожу в спортзал три раза в неделю.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I prefer communicative approach which helps students build up speaking skills, enrich vocabulary and improve grammar. My lessons contain a lot of interactive learning materials. My aim is to make you speak fluently and show that it is not that difficult as you think, on the contrary, it is a piece of cake. 

Предпочитаю коммуникативную методику, которая помогает студентам улучшить говорение, увеличить словарный запас, улучшить грамматику и аудирование. Мои уроки содержат много интерактивного материла. Моя цель - научить Вас говорить свободно, показать, что это не так сложно, как Вы думаете, напротив, проще простого.

course_info.trial_description:
During this class I usually prepare a lesson based on a student's requests( I always text students in advanced to find out about their level and needs) and give my feedback at the end of the lesson. Or a student can ask me all the questions during the class. 

Я обычно пишу студенту заранее, чтобы узнать какой у него/неё уровень и какие темы он/она хотел/хотела бы обсудить. Затем подготавливаю урок уже по имеющемуся уровню и запрошенным темам. В конце урока даю подробные комментарии и рекомендации. Или же, студент может задать все интересующие вопросы во время урока.

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description: Improve your English skills (reading, writing, listening and speaking) through interactive lessons designed to suit your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking English with Confidence
pro_course_detail.description: Lessons designed specifically to improve your spoken English. Lessons can be designed to achieve a specific goal (e.g. holiday English, social English, English for living abroad) or to work on your general speaking skills. Focus will also be places on improving pronunciation and vocabulary.

pro_course_detail.title: English Grammar
pro_course_detail.description: In grammar lessons, I will introduce new structure one by one. If you want homework, I can make some for you. If you want to study a specific grammar point, please message me about it at least one day in advance. If you don’t know which grammar structure to study, please tell me and I can choose one for you. If you want me to choose, I will send you a short grammar quiz by email. I will then make grammar lessons based on your mistakes. We can study with or without a textbook.

pro_course_detail.title: Listening
pro_course_detail.description:
I usually prepare interesting videos, audios or songs based on your needs and your level of English. 
In addition, the most effective exercises for learning real life English will help you improve your listening and speaking skills.

pro_course_detail.title: OGE, EGE, IELTS, FCE, CAE Preparation
pro_course_detail.description: Lessons designed to help you prepare for the OGE and EGE. Lessons will be tailored to your needs, whether you are taking the test for the first time or need to improve your score in a particular area.

pro_course_detail.title: Phrasal Verbs, Idioms, Slang and Collocations
pro_course_detail.description: Enhance your vocabulary using phrasal verbs, idioms and collocations based on your needs and level of English.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian / Общий русский
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson can include all aspects of the language such as speaking, listening, reading and writing, depending on your goals. 

Данный урок включает в себя отработку таких навыков, как говорение, аудирование, чтение и письмо. Урок основывается на Вашем уровне владения языка и Ваших целей.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice / Разговорная практика русского языка
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson includes Russian speaking practice and is aimed at improving your speaking skills. We can discuss any topics you're interested in.

Данный урок включает в себя разговорную практику и нацелен на улучшение говорения. Мы можем обсуждать интересующие Вас темы или же я подготавливаю интересные и полезные темы для обсуждения, учитывая Ваш уровень и Ваши цели.

pro_course_detail.title: Grammar/Грамматика
pro_course_detail.description:
In grammar lessons, I will introduce new structure one by one. If you want homework, I can make some for you. If you want to study a specific grammar point, please message me about it at least one day in advance. If you don’t know which grammar structure to study, please tell me and I can choose one for you. If you want me to choose, I will send you a short grammar quiz by email. I will then make grammar lessons based on your mistakes. We can study with or without a textbook.

Данный урок включает в себя подготовленный материал, основанный на Вашем уровне, нуждах. Вы также можете заранее сообщить мне, какую тему хотели бы обсудить. Если Вы не знаете что хотели бы обсудить, я могу отправить Вам грамматический тест и уже на его результат построить урок. Если Вы хотели бы отработать тему, я могу подготовить домашнее задание.

pro_course_detail.title: Listening/Аудирование
pro_course_detail.description:
I usually prepare interesting videos, audios or songs based on your needs and your level of Russian. 
In addition, the most effective exercises for learning real life Russian will help you improve your listening and speaking skills.

Обычно я подготавливаю интересные видео, аудио или песни, основанными на Вашем уровне и нуждах. 
Вдобавок, самые эффективные задания помогут Вам улучшить аудирование и говорение.

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation/Произношение
pro_course_detail.description:
Данный урок поможет Вам улучить Ваше произношение, звучать как носитель. 
Я обычно подготавливаю материал под Ваш уровень и нужды. Вы также можете мне прислать какие темы Вы хотели бы изучить. Если Вы не знаете с чего начать, то я могу на уроке давать Вам небольшие тексты или фразы, которые Вы будете читать вслух. А после, мы будем обсуждать Ваши ошибки, выполнять специальные задания, направленные на исправление совершенных ошибок. Также я могу подготовить материал с заданиями  для самостоятельного изучения и отработки.

pro_course_detail.title: Slang, bad language, idioms, colloquial phrases, collocations/Сленг, маты, идиомы, разговорные фразы, устойчивые словосочетания
pro_course_detail.description: Здесь мы обсудим самые топовые и свежие выражение, идиомы, разговорные фразы. словосочетания, включая маты с подробным разором(по Вашему желанию). Обратим внимание на интонацию, произношение. Я также предоставлю примеры из жизни в печатном и в видео формате. И вишенка на торте - задания на отработку и на их запоминание.
